text: BaccaureaFlora Cochinchinensis 2: 661. 1790. is a genus of flowering plant belonging to the family Phyllanthaceae. The genus comprises over 100 species, distributed from Indomalesia to the West Pacific. Hue, Vietnam Baccaurea sapida in Pakke Tiger Reserve, India ==Selected species== Species are: {| | Baccaurea acuminata (Miq.) Müll.Arg. Baccaurea affinis Müll.Arg.
